channel.title: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash
channel.description: Hi there. If you are reading this I'm telling to you my problem: 1º: I obtained the "Long Jump Device" 2º: I went to the room that lends you to the Xen's portal 3º: The rooms closes 4º: Starts like desinfection in the room 5º: The room opens. 6º: When I'm leading to my objetive... ...the game crashes It's my horror story. I'm so close to finish the game but it freezes, stutters, and then crashes. It always happen there. I can't go any further. Have you got any idea of how to solve this problem? It would be so great. Please. Help

item.title: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash
item.dc:creator: imadoofus
item.description:
Recently finished Lambda Core, and I can vouch for the EXTREME lag. What kind of computer are you using? In all humble grace, my computer is a beast, and the ending of LC was still unplayable without turning down the settings, and it still lagged really bad. Could just be your computer.

Read full topic
item.source: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash

item.title: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash
item.dc:creator: Jdramirez
item.description:
The1Mir:

Hi there. If you are reading this I’m telling to you my problem:
1º: I obtained the “Long Jump Device”
2º: I went to the room that lends you to the Xen’s portal
3º: The rooms closes
4º: Starts like desinfection in the room
5º: The room opens.
6º: When I’m leading to my objetive…
…the game crashes
It’s my horror story. I’m so close to finish the game but it freezes, stutters, and then crashes.
It always happen there. I can’t go any further.
Have you got any idea of how to solve this problem?
It would be so great.
Please. Help

Looks like a teleportation failure since youre using a cracked version of your game. Try reinstalling it

Read full topic
item.source: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash

item.title: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash

mine crashes when i jump into the portal

Read full topic
item.source: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash

item.title: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
I got a massive lag and temporary black-screen Kernel device error in decontamination room and then huge lag in teleportation room, but I managed to finish the game somehow. Lots of people experience massive framerate drop here, because of all those lights that Source can’t handle very well. Developers know about this, I think it’s connected with your problem.
Strangely, when I loaded the game while those light emitters were already activated, I didn’t have lag anymore.

Read full topic
item.source: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash

item.title: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash
item.dc:creator: The1Mir
item.description:
Leijonasisu:

Not sure how close you are to the portal being open. But when the doctor says ‘Go now!’ you go now! LOL.

Happens to almost everyone. Just get in the portal quickly. Don’t hang around for it to get too big.

No man, I’m not missed in the game. In fact, I finished the original half life.
The problem is that when I’m going to the hall that leads you to the portal room the game freeze, stutters, and then crashes.
I don’t know, I’ll tell you some characteristics of my PC:
Videocard: AMD Radeon HD 6670
Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2100 CPU @ 3.10GHz
Sound and video drivers: Realtek High Definition Audio
AMD High Definition Audio Device

Don’t Know what else I have to Explain. If I have to put something else, you can help me. I just want to keep playing, I didn’t made nothing to deserve this.
Oh god…

Note: English is not my native language, so there can be some mistakes

Read full topic
item.source: Before entering Xen's portal... Kaput, crash
